title: How CrewAI Delivers Enterprise-Level Complexity Without Compromise
content: From my early days as an engineer I still remeber one of it's main guiding principles: KISS (Keep it Simple Stupid), what could also be put as "what is the minimum I get away with?"- thinking.In the AI orchestration space, complexity is often
author: João (Joe) Moura
